com.tacticalenterprisesltd

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tacticalenterprisesltd.Query

  • public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    The Query class is used internally by an instance of Editor. It encapsulates all the SQL (Structured Query Language) syntax required to interface with any database that supports SQL. Limiting the number of records for Server Side Processing is achievable on all versions of MySQL database, but only works with Oracle version 12c or higher.
    Version:
    1.5.0
    Author:
    Alan Shiers

      • setFilterLogicalOperator

        public void setFilterLogicalOperator(Query.FilterLogicalOperator operator)
        Set the logical operator as part of the WHERE filter when you have multiple conditions.
        Example: WHERE field1Name = someValue AND field2Name = someOtherValue The default is the AND operator. You can change it to OR. Please use the enum provided in this class.
        Parameters:
        operator -

      • getFilterLogicalOperator
